extension.description: KoDisplay (Kodi Display) is written for the Raspberry and connected displays driven by fbtft. You can find the code at https://github.com/vitalogy/script.kodisplay. The following libraries must be installed to get this addon to work: pygame, SDL-1.2, SDL-image, SDL-ttf, RPi.GPIO.
